titleStmt.title: A book for beginners, or, A help to young communicants that they may be fitted for the Holy communion, and receive it with profit. By S. Patrick, D.P.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston, bookseller to His most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: With an engraved half title reading: A help to communicants.
Place of publication supplied by cataloger.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
